entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 30 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
